items.title: Who's in charge of Venezuela and what happens next?
items.description: Donald Trump says the US will "run" Venezuela until a "safe" transition after capturing its president and first lady.

items.title: Police identify 16 more victims of Swiss bar fire
items.description: A criminal investigation has been launched into the fire, with families now facing an agonising wait to identify missing loved ones.

items.title: Wicked composer latest to cancel Kennedy Center gig after Trump name change
items.description: Stephen Schwartz says he will not appear at the arts venue as it "has now become an ideological statement".

items.title: Brigitte Bardot Foundation issues warning about scam memorabilia
items.description: Online adverts tout merchandise of the actress with claims the proceeds will go to her charity, it says.

items.title: Trump says US will 'run' Venezuela and 'fix oil infrastructure'
items.description: The US launched strikes on Venezuela on Saturday in which Maduro and his wife were captured by US forces.
